data.name: "LIFE" not found; Sheet Music
data.detailed_description:
Whether you're a beginner trying out simple songs or just an experienced fan of the music, here are the music sheets for the songs in the game. The images contain the first pages of each sheet.

They come in the .png, .jpg and .mxl formats.

You can locate them in the DLC folder in the main game's directory, which can be found by right clicking the game in the library and pressing "Browse local files" within the "manage" section.

*NOTE: The music sheet for melancholy; is kinda messy, as I am not experienced with these yet I do not know how to fix it. If anyone can make a proper sheet for the song feel free to send it to me in the formats above.
